section2.title: Message from the Director
section2.paragraph:
Kaoua Food is an Algerian company founded in 2011, specialized in the production of agri-food products.

Recognized for its iconic spread Optilla, the brand quickly established itself as a reference in the hearts of Algerian consumers.

Building on this success, Kaoua Food expanded its portfolio with a complete range of confectioneries, hard candies, and jellies: combining taste, innovation, and consistent quality.

In 2024, the company launched a premium range of chocolate and biscuits under the MOON brand, responding to a growing demand for quality products accessible to a wide audience.

section3.title: HISTORY
section3.p1: An Algerian company founded in 2011, specialized in the production of agri-food products.
section3.p2: Renowned for its famous spread Optilla, the Kaoua Food brand quickly became a household name in Algeria. Building on this success, it now offers a wide range of confectionery products combining taste, innovation, and quality.

section4.title:
OUR
MISSION
section4.p1: Our mission is to offer superior quality products that combine flavor, trust, and accessibility, to meet the daily expectations of our consumers.

values.title: Quality
values.content: We are committed to offering products that combine excellence and taste.

values.title: Innovation
values.content: Our expertise and our R&D department are fully dedicated to product creation.

values.title: Proximity
values.content: We place the Algerian consumer at the heart of our strategy.

redcard.title:
Our
Mission
redcard.p2: We aim to make every Kaoua Food product a symbol of trust, innovation, and national pride, enriching consumers’ everyday moments with authenticity and generosity.

engagements.title: Manufacturing Process
engagements.paragraph: Our factories are equipped with specialized production lines for spreads, biscuits, and confectionery. Every step, from the selection of raw materials to packaging, is precisely controlled. Our process is designed to combine industrial efficiency with gourmet excellence.

engagements.title: Innovation & Industrial Expertise
engagements.paragraph: At Kaoua Food, innovation is at the heart of our industrial approach. Our R&D teams work in synergy with our production units to create tasty and distinctive products. Our modern industrial tools allow us to respond with agility to market changes. This combination of technology, creativity, and rigor is what makes us strong.

engagements.title: Quality & ISO 9001 Certification
engagements.paragraph: Kaoua Food is ISO 9001 certified, a recognition of our quality management system. This certification ensures controlled processes, continuous improvement, and a strong customer focus. It reflects our commitment to providing safe, consistent, and reliable products.

engagements.title: Personal Data Protection
engagements.paragraph: Kaoua Food is committed to strictly complying with Law 18-07 on personal data protection. We handle our clients’, partners’, and employees’ information with transparency and responsibility.
